text: Linear regression was used to correlate CBF measurements made by conventional frame by frame counting of individual ciliary beat cycles by slow - motion playback of digital high - speed video sequences to measurements obtained using the ciliaFA system ( for the same region of interest ) . All regions of interest were chosen based on areas where optimal images of moving cilia were visible to the observer . The video sequences were reanalyzed by a second observer . Paired t tests were performed to compare the CBF obtained using the two methods and the Bland - Altman limits of agreement were calculated from the mean difference ± the 95 % confidence intervals between the two methods .
